name: Not Another Trash Game
description:
Make the world a better place, even if you think you can't turn it around on your own. You walk through your town and realize how filthy your village actually is. Even if you don't like your neighbors very much, you still care about how dirty your streets are. You decide to clean up first. Off you go on your journey to beautiful Trash Village.

David Melamed-GameDevoloper

Majbrit-Designer

Yusuf Ozdemir-AudioDesigner

Mehmet Sahin Uces-GameDevoloper

#GlobalGameJam2022
